info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, south central Henderson and western McDonough Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Harpe, or 14 miles northwest of Macomb, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blandinsville around 355 PM CDT. Sciota around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Macomb, Colchester, Tennessee, Fandon and Western Illinois University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
